explanations.reason: The paper focuses on identifying technology-based service opportunities through patent analysis, specifically using methods like patent co-classification analysis, analytic network process, and data envelopment analysis window analysis. There is no mention or implication of any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies in the title or abstract. The study is centered on business method patent analysis and quantitative methodologies for service opportunity identification, not on any of the provided machine learning or deep learning keywords.
